title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Transients in lumped parameter and distributed parameter circuits-wave equations; Multi-conductor systems, switching surge studies -Dommels method, EMTP. Frequency domain approach. Surge response of transformers. Overvoltage mitigation. Surge Arresters. Insulation co-ordination. Philosophy of power system protection, Relaying Instrumentation-characteristics of CT and PT. Overview of computer relaying, hardware organization, Algorithm development, Applications, Integration to substation function, Adaptive protection philosophy.
